text: Arrā wa anata gata no tame ni, sono-ka o anjū no tokoro to sa re, mata anata gata no tame ni, kachiku no kawa de tsukutta ie o sadame rare, anata gata no tabi no toki, mata yadoru toki, sore o (mochihakobi no tame ni) keiben ni nasa reta. Mata yōmō ya, kegawa ya jūmō ya nichiyōhin o, hitotsu no jiki made no yō ni kyōshutsu nasa reta
